name: Critical Infrastructure Cyber Attack
description: A sophisticated coordinated cyber attack has targeted Greece's critical infrastructure systems. The national power grid control systems, emergency services dispatch (112), hospital networks, and banking systems are experiencing widespread disruptions. Ransomware has encrypted essential data across multiple sectors. Traffic control systems in Athens are offline. There are indications of a nation-state actor. Emergency services are operating with degraded capabilities while essential services are failing.

location.region: National - Primary impact Athens and major cities, Greece

available_actions.name: Immediate System Isolation and Containment
available_actions.description: Isolate affected systems from networks, shut down compromised infrastructure, prevent spread, activate backup systems where available

available_actions.name: Switch to Manual Emergency Operations
available_actions.description: Activate manual protocols for emergency services, power grid, traffic control; deploy personnel for manual operations while systems are restored

available_actions.name: Priority Forensics and System Restoration
available_actions.description: Deploy cyber forensics teams to assess damage, identify attack vectors, begin systematic restoration of critical systems starting with emergency services

available_actions.name: Emergency Public Communication Campaign
available_actions.description: Launch immediate public awareness campaign about service disruptions, provide alternative emergency contact methods, prevent public panic

available_actions.name: Comprehensive National Cyber Emergency Response
available_actions.description: Integrated approach: immediate system isolation, manual emergency operations activation, priority restoration of life-safety systems, forensic investigation, international coordination, public communication

additional_concerns: Potential for data theft in addition to disruption
Restoration may take days or weeks
Hospital systems compromised affecting patient care
Potential for physical safety incidents due to traffic system failures
